nodes.excerpt: It's about time docs were easy to use, flexible, and actually smart. We designed Input to have the simplicity of writing in a doc, but combined with some of the most powerful features of project management, so remote teams can get more done.

nodes.excerpt: RHTRH is an open source Chrome extension that raises your (virtual) hand on Google Meet when you raise your (physical) hand. RHTRH works with on any Chromium browsers for all organisations using Google Workspace.

nodes.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
nodes.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.
nodes.author: Meritt Thomas

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即时计算任何纵横比。

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即時計算任何縱橫比。

nodes.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations
nodes.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Textcraft是一款适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇实用程序，允许您将任何文本实时转换为各种80多种不同的格式。
localize.tagline: 魔术文本转换

localize.description: Textcraft是一款適用於iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇實用程序，允許您將任何文本實時轉換爲各種80多種不同的格式。
localize.tagline: 魔術文本轉換
